description.en_US: The action is used for publish output message through websocket connection.
description.zh_CN: 该操作用于将输出消息发布通过 websocket 链接发送

hint.en_US: specify the source to reuse the connection defined in connection configuration.
hint.zh_CN: 复用 connection 中定义的连接

hint.en_US: websocket server address. If this address is defined, then eKuiper will apply for a websocket request to this address. If this address is not defined, then eKuiper will act as the websocket server itself.
hint.zh_CN: websocket server 端地址，如果定义了该地址，那么 eKuiper 将会向该地址申请 websocket 请求，如果没有定义该地址，那么 eKuiper 将会自己作为 websocket server 端

hint.en_US: The url for websocket to apply for a connection. If addr is defined, then eKuiper will apply for a connection to the path where addr is located. If the addr is not defined, then eKuiper will use this url as the websocket server.
hint.zh_CN: websocket 申请连接的 url，如果定义了 addr，那么 eKuiper 将会向 addr 所在 path 端申请连接，如果没有定义 url，那么 eKuiper 将会自身以该 url 作为 websocket server 端

hint.en_US: The certification path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path. If it is an relative path, then the base path is where you excuting the kuiperd command. For example, if you run bin/kuiperd from /var/kuiper, then the base path is /var/kuiper; If you run ./kuiperd from /var/kuiper/bin, then the base path is /var/kuiper/bin.
hint.zh_CN: 证书路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。如果指定的是相对路径，那么父目录为执行 kuiperd 命令的路径。比如，如果你在 /var/kuiper 中运行 bin/kuiperd ，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper; 如果运行从 /var/kuiper/bin 中运行./kuiperd，那么父目录为 /var/kuiper/bin

hint.en_US: The private key path. It can be either absolute path, or relative path, which is similar to use of certificationPath.
hint.zh_CN: 私钥路径。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径，相对路径的用法与 certificationPath 类似

hint.en_US: The location of root ca path. It can be an absolute path, or a relative path.
hint.zh_CN: 根证书路径，用以验证服务器证书。可以为绝对路径，也可以为相对路径。

hint.en_US: If InsecureSkipVerify is true, TLS accepts any certificate presented by the server and any host name in that certificate.  In this mode, TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks. The default value is false. The configuration item can only be used with TLS connections.
hint.zh_CN: 如果 InsecureSkipVerify 设置为 true, TLS接受服务器提供的任何证书以及该证书中的任何主机名。 在这种模式下，TLS容易受到中间人攻击。默认值为false。配置项只能用于TLS连接。
